decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to deal with damage and eventually win. The deck includes cards such as Avenger of Zendikar and Primeval Titan to take advantage of Valakut triggers, while also using ramp spells like Harrow and Cultivate to quickly assemble the necessary lands. Cards like Summoning Trap and Oracle of Mul Daya provide additional utility and card advantage, while removal spells like Lightning Bolt help maintain control of the board.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up quickly using cards like Cultivate, Growth Spasm, and Joraga Treespeaker to get the mana needed to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, Kozilek, and Emrakul. The deck also uses cards like Primeval Titan and Wurmcoil Engine to control the board and generate advantage. The Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin provide additional mana acceleration and discounts on Eldrazi spells. Overall, the deck focuses on controlling the game and overwhelming the opponent with massive creatures.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using mana dorks like Llanowar Elves and Arbor Elf, as well as Lotus Cobra, to cast powerful creatures like Leatherback Baloth and Elvish Archdruid. This deck also utilizes cards like Nissa Revane and Ezuri, Renegade Leader to pump up elves and overrun the opponent with a swarm of creatures. The inclusion of cards like Eldrazi Monument and Genesis Wave provide additional win conditions and ways to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers. By disrupting your opponent's game plan with cards like Mana Leak and Deprive, while also ramping up to play big threats like Frost Titan and Inferno Titan, you can dominate the board and ultimately win the game with cards like Destructive Force. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast your opponent by controlling the pace of the game and unleashing devastating forces when the time is right.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Explore, Cultivate, and Eldrazi Temple to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Primeval Titan, Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. It also includes board control elements like Ratchet Bomb and All Is Dust to deal with threats, while utilizing cards like Summoning Trap to cheat out Eldrazi creatures for free. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures and disrupt their strategy with removal and land destruction.

The main concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly through cards like Joraga Treespeaker, Overgrown Battlement, and Eldrazi Temple in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Primeval Titan, Wurmcoil Engine, and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. The deck also utilizes cards like Summoning Trap and Mystifying Maze to control the board and protect against threats. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with large, hard-to deal with creatures and take control of the game.

This UW Control deck focuses on maintaining board control through counter spells, removal, and card advantage provided by cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Wall of Omens. The deck aims to stall the opponent's threats with cards like Condemn and Day of Judgment, while generating value through planeswalkers like Elspeth Tirel and Jace Beleren. The win condition is typically through powerful creatures like Baneslayer Angel and Sun Titan, backed up by powerful planeswalkers and card advantage. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game and outvalue the opponent for a slow but inevitable victory.

The main focus of this deck is to ramp up mana production with cards like Cultivate, Explore, and Khalni Heart Expedition in order to consistently play powerful land cards like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Primeval Titan. By efficiently searching for and playing key cards, the deck aims to control the game with powerful creatures like Inferno Titan and Avenger of Zendikar, while also using spells like Lightning Bolt and Summoning Trap to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, cards like Oracle of Mul Daya and Wurmcoil Engine provide additional versatility and resilience to the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fauna Shaman to consistently tutor for powerful creatures like Vengevine, Lotus Cobra, and Razorverge Thicket to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature plays. The deck also includes control elements like Mana Leak and planeswalkers Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Venser, the Sojourner to protect and support the aggressive game plan. The inclusion of cards like Celestial Colonnade and Squardon Hawk provide additional versatility and late-game reach to ensure victory against a variety of opponents.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Joraga Treespeaker and Overgrown Battlement to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Primeval Titan, Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. It also runs control elements like All Is Dust and Tectonic Edge to disrupt opponents, while cards like Wurmcoil Engine provide versatility and protection. The inclusion of Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin allows for faster and easier casting of Eldrazi creatures, making it a formidable control deck with a strong late-game presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Lotus Cobra and Birds of Paradise, while also utilizing Fauna Shaman to repeatedly tutor for key creatures like Vengevine or Wurmcoil Engine. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early with aggro creatures like Cunning Sparkmage and Inferno Titan, while also controlling the board with cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Mana Leak. The inclusion of cards like Basilisk Collar and Brittle Effigy provide additional utility and removal options to further solidify the deck's advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly play creatures and equipment cards to complete the Quest for the Holy Relic. By utilizing aggressive creatures like Kor Duelist and Kor Outfitter, along with equipment cards like Argentum Armor and Sword of Body and Mind, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful attackers while also generating value from equipment bonuses. The inclusion of cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Mox Opal help with card advantage and mana acceleration, allowing the deck to maintain pressure on opponents and win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on using control spells and powerful planeswalkers to dominate the game, with a strong mana base for consistency. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building card advantage and eventually winning with powerful threats such as Baneslayer Angel and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. By carefully managing resources and utilizing counterspells and removal, the deck can outlast and outplay opponents to secure victory in the long game. The key strategy is to control the pace of the game and dictate the board state to secure a win through card advantage and powerful finishers.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through countering opponent's spells and controlling the board with removal spells like Day of Judgment and Journey to Nowhere. It also utilizes planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Elspeth Tirel to generate advantage and win the game. The deck can also generate value through cards like Trinket Mage and Sun Titan, while utilizing cards like Celestial Colonnade for additional win conditions. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent until it can secure a victory through its powerful spells and creatures.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful threats like Primeval Titan, Avenger of Zendikar, and Inferno Titan. The key strategy is to get Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle online as soon as possible to deal massive damage to the opponent's creatures or face. Cards like Explore, Cultivate, and Khalni Heart Expedition help to accelerate the mana base, while Lightning Bolt and Wurmcoil Engine provide removal and lifegain to control the board. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats and burn spells for a swift victory.

The deck focuses on using ramp spells like Cultivate and Explore to quickly build up mana for powerful spells like Primeval Titan and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. Lightning Bolt and Koth of the Hammer provide removal and additional damage, while cards like Wurmcoil Engine and Inferno Titan offer threats that can quickly close out the game. The combination of land ramp and powerful finishers allows the deck to control the game and overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats.
